titles: Edinburgh, June the first. Since our last we have an account, that the late Earl of Argyle did on the twenty sixth of the last month march from Campletoun in Kintire with two troops of horse (such as could be had in that country) and seven hundred foot to Tarbert, ...
publisher: re-printed by the heir of Andrew Anderson, printer to His most Sacred Majesty,
notes: Title from caption and opening lines of text.
